name: HTTP_TOOLS__GET_URL
description: Fetches content from a URL using GET request, extracts clean text using html2text, and returns formatted content with links. Includes security checks to prevent accessing internal services.

url.description: The URL to fetch content from using GET request.

max_length.description: Maximum length of returned text for LLM processing (default: 10000 characters).

include_links.description: Whether to include extracted links in the response (default: true).
